original_text: And you shall make two cherubim of gold; of hammered work shall you make them, on the two ends of the mercy seat.
korean_text: 금으로 그룹 둘을 속죄소 두 끝에 쳐서 만들되

sentences.original_text: And you shall make two cherubim of gold
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 금으로 두 그룹을 만들어야 한다

sentences.original_text: of hammered work shall you make them
on the two ends of the mercy seat
